name: raspberry
actor_no_arg: You stick your tongue out at ... well, no one.
others_no_arg: $n sticks $s tongue out, catching a few flies in the process.
actor_found_target: You give $N the raspberry... and spit all over yourself.
others_found: $n gives $N the raspberry... PHBT!  What a mess... Spit EVERYWHERE!
target_found: You are splattered with saliva as $n gives you the raspberry... HOW RUDE!
actor_auto: Hang your tongue out if you like, $e isn't here.
others_auto: $n sticks $s tongue out and spits all over $mself in the process.
